articles.title: Four people shot dead in Lenasia - eNCA
articles.description: At least four people were shot dead in the Thembelihle informal settlement in Lenasia.
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG - At least four people were shot dead in the Thembelihle informal settlement in Lenasia.
Two more were wounded.
In the video above, Gauteng Police Commissioner Elias Mawela explains wh… [+11 chars]

articles.title: Unstoppable dollar risks worsening $71 billion Asia stock exodus | Mint - Mint
articles.description: A gauge of Asian currencies has slumped to its lowest in more than two years, an ominous sign for equities given their strong relationship with moves in foreign exchange.
articles.content: The dollars relentless rise is threatening to trigger more outflows from Asias emerging-market shares, spoiling hopes of the region making a comeback in the second half. A gauge of Asian currencies h… [+3793 chars]

articles.title: The candlemaker cousins who turned their passion hobby for scented candles into a budding business - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In this week's Creative Capital, we meet multicultural cousins Sarah Wee and Cheyenne Naidu, who started candle company Nitwick as a way to bond while indulging their love for creativity.
articles.content:
HOW HARD IS IT TO LEARN CANDLE MAKING?
